original_title: 5 Vezes Chico: O Velho e sua Gente
overview: Five directors with five completely different cinematic styles go on an affectionate journey through each one of the five states bathed by the gigantic São Francisco River. Faith, passions, legends and the search for survival in the riverside communities of this river full of colors, which cuts through the dry hinterlands and flows into the exuberant sea of Northeastern Brazil.
title: 5 Vezes Chico: O Velho e sua Gente
